Data loaded New structure was successfully downloaded and saved. Last update on %1$s. No school study structure found, please download new from settings. Display all No exams were found in this period. No exams match selected filter. Access denied! No e-mail client is installed. No credentials were set. Registration was successful Registration was not successful Logging off was successful Logging off was not successful Do you really want to log off from this exam? Do you really want to cancel scheduled registration? This feature allows you to schedule registration of an exam in ISIS right on its registration date. Please note, that your device must be turned on around the time of registration, and that this feature might not guarantee registration on selected exam (especially if school server is under heavy load). Processing data Downloading exams No network connection!!! To be able to use this app properly, you need to connect your device to the internet. Please do so and try this again. Network error Could not download exam list from system ISIS. This is probably due to poor network connection. Do you want to try again?
User name (x-name) Password Input your valid x-name. Input your valid password. Login
Registration start Registration of the exam %1$s will start in a few seconds. Please note, that keeping your device still may improve your chances to be successful. Registration in progress Registration of the exam %1$s is in progress. Please note, that keeping your device still may improve your chances to be successful. Registration was successful! You were successfully registered to the exam %1$s on %2$s! Registration failure Unfortunately registration of the exam %1$s failed. Heavy load of school servers have caused wrong evaluation of registration requests. We apologize for any damage caused.
